description: Retrieves a list that describes the available WorkSpace bundles. You can filter the results using either bundle ID or owner, but not both.

parameters.name: BundleIds
parameters.description: The identifiers of the bundles. You cannot combine this parameter with any other filter. (string) ---

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description: The owner of the bundles. You cannot combine this parameter with any other filter. To describe the bundles provided by Amazon Web Services, specify AMAZON. To describe the bundles that belong to your account, don't specify a value.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the bundle. This is the account identifier of the owner, or AMAZON if the bundle is provided by Amazon Web Services.

nested_items.name: ImageId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the image that was used to create the bundle.

nested_items.name: RootStorage
nested_items.description: The size of the root volume.

nested_items.name: Capacity
nested_items.description: The size of the root volume.

nested_items.name: UserStorage
nested_items.description: The size of the user volume.

nested_items.name: Capacity
nested_items.description: The size of the user volume.

nested_items.name: ComputeType
nested_items.description: The compute type of the bundle. For more information, see Amazon WorkSpaces Bundles.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the bundle was updated.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the bundle was created.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the WorkSpace bundle.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return. This token is valid for one day and must be used within that time frame.
